name: Chip Off The Ol' Stumbling Block
name_original: Chip Off The Ol' Stumbling Block
description:
Chip Off The Ol' Stumbling Block is a runner where you use physics to weave between obstacles, set off explosives, and use your environment to reach the end of a 10'000 meter track!



Five different environments, each with their own views and challenges.



Nine obstacle types provide unique interactions!



Use physics to jump around the path.



Some obstacles aren't happy to just stand still and take the hit.



Go up to outer space!
